group_1.narration: And then Livia came to my house@to greet my mother.
To get me into Coordinator training,@she wanted to keep me under her care for a while@and treat it like homeschooling.

group_1.textRight: What yer girl needs right now is ta see@the wide world and learn from it, don't ya think?

group_1.textLeft: Yes...you're right, homeschooling...@[chara:801000:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:801000:cheek_0][chara:801000:face_mtn_ex_010.exp3.json][chara:801000:lipSynch_1]Yeah, maybe that's best for her.

group_1.textRight: ...[wait:0.8][chara:104101:cheek_0][chara:104101:face_mtn_ex_010.exp3.json][chara:104101:lipSynch_1]Thank ya kindly. Deciding so quickly@saves me lots of trouble.
Well then, I'll pay ya a visit real soon to handle@all the bits and pieces of the process...
...That's right, nearly forgot to offer@these donuts as my gift to ya.

group_1.textLeft: Aww, that's okay, you didn't have to...

group_1.textRight: I got chocolate and strawberry,@but do ya happen to have a preference?

group_1.textLeft: Um...I don't mind either...@I'm grateful just to get anything.

group_1.textRight: Well now...it wasn't from the incident.@This whole time she just got it from her mother.

group_1.textLeft: (Ha―...if this keeps up, Livia's going@to eat them both...!)
Fu...funmu―!

group_1.textRight: Oh...[chara:104101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:104101:cheek_0][chara:104101:face_mtn_ex_010.exp3.json][chara:104101:lipSynch_1]are ya gonna choose for her?
Alright then, how 'bout we eat@the rest up in the trailer?
Alright now, starting today,@you're spending your time here, and...
Oh, yer back, huh.@Now there's some good timing!

group_1.textLeft: Fu-fumu―?!

group_1.textRight: That's right, y'all haven't met before.
This here's another of my apprentices, Yozuru.@She'll be learnin' with ya, so get along.
A pleasure to meet you.@I go by Yozuru Sasame.

group_1.textLeft: Fu-fumu... Fumumumu...fumunmumu...

group_1.textRight: Hah? I'm unable to understand@what you are saying.

group_1.textLeft: It's kinda hard ta explain...@Sudachi here can't talk fer various reasons.

group_1.textRight: ...Is that so; why is that?@Why is she unable to speak?

group_1.textLeft: Fu-fumumu...
That's enough, Yozuru...@It ain't my place ta speak for her,
but askin' her so bluntly right outta@the gate ain't kind, now is it?

group_1.textRight: Ah...apologies. A moment, please,@my memo...

group_1.textLeft: (A memo...? What's that about...?)

group_1.textRight: Ah! Here it is!
...When regarding the private matters of individuals,@be careful not to make invasive statements...
Apologies, was that a personal matter@to you just now?
By the by, what brings you to@the Coordinator shop?

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah, um, that's a bit personal too.

group_1.textRight: Ah―...I was, um... I am incredibly sorry...

group_1.textLeft: Excuse her, this girl's got a lot goin' on@so she ain't great at dealin' with people.

group_1.textRight: Nevertheless, I have the memo you gave@me on kind behavior, Miss Livia.

group_1.textLeft: Even if you got a memo, it ain't helpin'@if ya don't follow 'em.

group_1.textRight: ...You are correct.

group_1.textLeft: (Oh...maybe this person's not so scary@after all...?)
(Also, the mood here is kinda peaceful...)

group_1.narration: Because of that incident, the adults are all@really nice to me. They're probably treating me@delicately, I think.
That's why I thought the air between@those two was kinda nice back then.
But the more I thought how fun it was,@the more I wondered if it was okay for@a sinner like me to laugh, and I got filled@with anxiety instead.
So I decided to tell them,@in my own words, what I did.

group_1.textRight: I got the picture from back then...@...That explains it all well enough.

group_1.textLeft: ...Fumunmufunmu?

group_1.textRight: Do you hate it? Why is that?
Since you've been scouted by Miss Livia,@you must have your special reasons as I do.
...She's got that right, we're all carryin' our sins,@that's why we gotta save others.

group_1.textLeft: ...Fumumu, fumumumu.@Fumumu, fumumufumumun.

group_1.textRight: To live and atone for our sins...?@[chara:104001:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:104001:cheek_0][chara:104001:face_mtn_ex_010.exp3.json][chara:104001:lipSynch_1]...Yes, let us both do our best together.

group_1.textLeft: Fumufumu―!

group_1.textRight: ...Ya know, I've been wonderin' for a bit,
but how come Yozuru's the only one@understandin' what Sudachi's sayin' here?

group_1.textLeft: ...Eh? No, we've been using telepathy@like normal...

group_1.textRight: The heck, she's hasn't done that@with me...!

group_1.textLeft: Ahh...would it have been kind to have kept@that hidden since it would be boasting?

group_1.textRight: Boasting...ya didn't even do it intentionally,@yet it's more annoyin' that way...

group_1.textLeft: Fumumu.

group_1.textRight: Goodness...@[chara:104101:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:104101:cheek_0][chara:104101:face_mtn_ex_010.exp3.json][chara:104101:motion_200][chara:104101:lipSynch_1]Well, it's a step forward I s'pose.
Don't get so attached to just her, now,@and take it easy round here, Sudachi.

group_1.textLeft: Fumu―!

group_1.narration: And so, to become a Coordinator,@and to live to atone for my sins,@I took my first step forward.
Every time I save a Magical Girl,@I feel like my sins wash away, little by little.@Plus, ever since I came to Kamihama,@I became friends with Mii.
But I'm sure my sins will never really go away.@...I don't want them gone.
Even so, I'll live, and I'll keep on living.@I wish to save everyone.@Because that's the path I chose.
"Carry your sins and die."@Those words will never leave my heart, but...
I'll "keep on living" as my decision.@My feelings at this time,@they're my original resolution...@My true start.
